body.description: New all free clear Mega Pacs, are bigger pacs with 2x the stainlifting power* that can conquer any laundry load so that you can get back to doing what you love. Mega Pacs deliver a one and all done clean that can tackle small, medium, and large laundry loads and all fabric types. These Mega Pacs are Tough on Stains, Gentle on Skin. all free clear Mega Pacs deliver a confident clean from the #1 recommended detergent brand by dermatologists, allergists and pediatricians for sensitive skin. 100% free of perfumes and dyes, all free clear Mega Pacs conquer laundry while being gentle on skin. When it comes to laundry care for sensitive skin, all free clear detergent is the obvious choice. Use with all Free clear fabric softener and dryer Sheets for clean and soft clothes with static cling reduction in the dryer. all free clear Mega Pacs are unscented, fragrance free, and are safe to use in any washing machine including high efficiency (HE) and at any water temperature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I prefer to use these opposed to using liquid. I need less of theses than the little ones sold at the store. Very easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good value for the money
reviews.reviewText: We usually buy the regular sized pacs and these larger ones with twice the soap make for convenient washes, one replacing two at slightly less cost per load.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does a great job, is easy to use, and there's no scent
reviews.reviewText: Recently I broke out in rashes, so I changed anything I could to make them go away. One of those things was laundry detergent that was unscented and for sensitive skin. This one comes in little packets that you toss in with your laundry. It comes in a container that locks. You have to align the arrows in order to open it, which is annoying, but if you have children at your house, it might be important. My clothes look and smell great. I'm very happy with this detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Scent-free and gentle
reviews.reviewText: I've been using All Free & Clear for many years, since my dermatologist suggested that my previous detergent might be causing skin rashes. She recommended this product and I've been happy with it ever since, and this purchase was no different.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was not able to find this product ( Mega pacs) in the stores do I was so pleased to find it on Amazon. I use All all the time but so happy they have a product with alittle more detergent in the pacs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect for washing my son's uniforms, as he is in law enforcement. He, my husband, I all have sensitive skin and can only use fragrance free products. I have used All products for many years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was buying the regular sized pods and having to use two at a time. I got these and so happy that I found them. I only have to use one pod and they are much better value if you do large loads of laundry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only detergent I'll use!!!
reviews.reviewText: Love the larger size! Very convenient!
